Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.ResourceCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.GoldCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoldCard extends ResourceCard
The GoldCard class represents a card that gives points based on certain requirements only if all the criteria are met you can play this card
